i.name: Nimble Fighter
i.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

q.name: Urchin Strike
q.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

w.name: Seastone Trident
w.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

e.name: Playful / Trickster
e.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

r.name: Chum the Waters
r.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Fizz''' is perpetually {{tip|ghosted}} and takes {{pp|6|4 to  14|1 to 16|displayformula = 4+2 every 3 levels}} less {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} from [[basic attack]]s, applied before other modifiers.
i1.name: Nimble Fighter
notes: * No additional notes.

riot.name: Nimble Fighter
riot.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

q1.blurb: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed distance towards the target enemy, dealing {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}, and {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
The {{as|physical damage}} applies [[on-hit effect]]s to the target.
q1.name: Urchin Strike
notes: * Once ''Fizz'' has used it, ''Urchin Strike'' can be dodged with sufficiently fast displacement, resulting in no damage dealt.
* ''Urchin Strike'' applies all melee on-hit effects ({{sti|life steal}}, {{nie|Spellblade}}, {{ii|Blade of the Ruined King}}) as well as {{sti|spell vamp}}.
** The physical component can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} and can {{tip|blind|miss}}.

** The physical component will only apply {{sti|life steal}} and physical damage {{nie|Spellblade}} effects ({{ii|Trinity Force}}, {{ii|Iceborn Gauntlet}}) but {{sti|spell vamp}} will apply to the combined physical and magic damage.
*** {{sti|Spell vamp}} will not be applied on the damage from on-hit effects.
**** {{ii|Wit's End}} and {{ii|Lich Bane}} will not benefit from either {{sti|life steal}} or {{sti|spell vamp}}.

riot.name: Urchin Strike
riot.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
riot.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing <scaleAD>{{ a2 }}</scaleAD> physical damage plus <magicDamage>{{ qdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. This spell applies on-hit effects.

w1.blurb: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Fizz's''' basic attacks rend enemies on-hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} over 3 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz's''' next basic attack is empowered, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and gaining {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}.

If ''Seastone Trident'' kills its target, its {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to 1 second and refunds {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}. Otherwise, if ''Seastone Trident'' doesn't kill its target, '''Fizz's''' basic attacks gain {{as|'''bonus''' on-hit magic damage}} for 5 seconds.
''Seastone Trident'' resets '''Fizz's''' autoattack timer.
leveling:
{{st|Mana Refunded|{{ap|20 to 52}}}}
{{st|Bonus On-Hit Damage|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Seastone Trident
notes: * The active does not trigger spell effects.
* The passive's damage-over-time applies every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
** Every subsequent hit over the active's duration will refresh the passive's.

riot.name: Seastone Trident
riot.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's basic attacks bleed his enemies, dealing {{ dotdamage }} magic damage over {{ bleedduration }} seconds.

Active: Fizz's next basic attack deals an additional {{ activedamage }} bonus magic damage and empowers Fizz's attacks for {{ onhitbuffduration }} seconds, dealing an additional {{ onhitbuffdamage }} magic damage on hit.

If the first attack kills a target, it refunds {{ onkillmanarefund }} mana, resets its cooldown to {{ onkillnewcooldown }} second and does not grant the {{ onhitbuffduration }} second on-hit buff.

e1.blurb: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
description: {{sbc|Single Cast:}} '''Fizz''' {{tip|dash|vaults}} towards the target location, becoming {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds while balancing on his Trident.

If the spell is not cast a second time, '''Fizz''' completes his {{tip|dash|vaults}} after a brief pause and splashes onto the ground below him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} in a radius to nearby enemies and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.

{{sbc|Double Cast:}} '''Fizz''' dismounts his trident without pausing, allowing him to perform both {{tip|dashes}} in a quick succession. Upon landing, he deals {{as|damage|magic damage}} to nearby enemies. The damage dealt is the same as the single-cast version, but with a smaller radius and without applying a slow.
Both {{tip|dashes}} may be directed separately.
e1.name: Playful / Trickster
notes: * ''Playful'' / ''Trickster'' does not break tethers ({{ai|Drain|Fiddlesticks}}, {{ai|Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}}).
** Can be used to jump over/through walls.
*** ''Playful'' can be used to avoid the likes of {{ai|Requiem|Karthus}}, {{ai|Ace in the Hole|Caitlyn}}, or {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}} being applied (not the detonation).
* After ''Playful'' is used (without activating ''Trickster'') ''Fizz'' can be directed where to land by right-clicking before/as he drops for a longer reach (but same radius) on the slow/damage.
** ''Playful'' cannot be used for approximately {{fd|0.5}} seconds after using {{ai|Urchin Strike|Fizz}}.

riot.name: Playful / Trickster
riot.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
riot.tooltip:
Fizz hops on his trident towards the cursor, becoming briefly untargetable.

Reactivation: Fizz cancels the spell early, jumping towards the cursor a second time and dealing {{ edamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies.

If Fizz does not reactivate, he deals damage in a larger area and slows all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

e2.blurb: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
description: {{sbc|Single Cast:}} '''Fizz''' {{tip|dash|vaults}} towards the target location, becoming {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds while balancing on his Trident.

If the spell is not cast a second time, '''Fizz''' completes his {{tip|dash|vaults}} after a brief pause and splashes onto the ground below him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} in a radius to nearby enemies and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.

{{sbc|Double Cast:}} '''Fizz''' dismounts his trident without pausing, allowing him to perform both {{tip|dashes}} in a quick succession. Upon landing, he deals {{as|damage|magic damage}} to nearby enemies. The damage dealt is the same as the single-cast version, but with a smaller radius and without applying a slow.
Both {{tip|dashes}} may be directed separately.
e2.name: Playful / Trickster
notes: * ''Playful'' / ''Trickster'' does not break tethers ({{ai|Drain|Fiddlesticks}}, {{ai|Ethereal Chains|LeBlanc}}).
** Can be used to jump over/through walls.
*** ''Playful'' can be used to avoid the likes of {{ai|Requiem|Karthus}}, {{ai|Ace in the Hole|Caitlyn}}, or {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}} being applied (not the detonation).
* After ''Playful'' is used (without activating ''Trickster'') ''Fizz'' can be directed where to land by right-clicking before/as he drops for a longer reach (but same radius) on the slow/damage.
** ''Playful'' cannot be used for approximately {{fd|0.5}} seconds after using {{ai|Urchin Strike|Fizz}}.

riot.name: Playful / Trickster
riot.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
riot.tooltip:
Fizz hops on his trident towards the cursor, becoming briefly untargetable.

Reactivation: Fizz cancels the spell early, jumping towards the cursor a second time and dealing {{ edamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies.

If Fizz does not reactivate, he deals damage in a larger area and slows all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fizz''' throws down a lure in the target direction that attracts a shark, causing it to emerge after 2 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} surrounding enemies and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. The further the lure travels in its initial flight, the larger the shark that is attracted, increasing its slow, eruption radius and knockback distance.
{{sbc|Guppy (<455):}} 40% slow, 200 eruption radius and 150 unit knockback distance.
{{sbc|Chomper (455-910):}} 60% slow, 325 eruption radius and 250 unit knockback distance.
{{sbc|Gigalodon (>910):}} 80% slow, 450 eruption radius and 350 unit knockback distance.

If an enemy [[champion]] intercepts the lure as it flies, it binds to them and causes the shark to emerge at their position. The lure's holder is {{tip|slow|slowed}} for the duration and {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second instead of away.
r1.name: Chum the Waters
notes: * ''Chum the Waters'' will only attach the fish to an enemy champion and will pass through all terrain and non-champion targets.

** If the fish is thrown onto a target without an active spell shield, the target will be slowed. If the spell shield activates while the fish is already latched on, the slow will remain but the shark's damage and knockup will be negated, consuming the shield.

* The fish's slow can be removed by {{si|Cleanse}}, {{ii|Quicksilver Sash}}, {{ii|Mikael's Crucible}}, {{ai|Unbreakable Will|Alistar}}, {{ai|Shadow Step A|Kayn|Shadow Step}}, {{ai|Remove Scurvy|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Decisive Strike|Garen}}, {{ai|Highlander|Master Yi}}, and {{ai|Ragnarok|Olaf}}.
** The fish will still remain and the shark will still appear.
* ''Chum the Waters'' can hit [[stealth]]ed units and will be revealed if the fish hits them and until the shark appears.
** The shark will also damage untargetable champions.
*** If the target the fish latched on to dies before the shark appears, the moment the target dies the shark will appear immediately.

riot.name: Chum the Waters
riot.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
riot.tooltip:
Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first enemy champion it hits, slowing them, granting True Sight, and attracting a shark. After {{ e8 }} seconds, the shark erupts out of the ground, knocking its target up and knocking other enemies aside.

The farther the fish travels before attaching, the bigger the shark it attracts, dealing {{ smallsharkdamage }} to {{ bigsharkdamage }} magic damage and slowing by 40% to 80%.
